Author: Doublebosco

Comment: The sooner that the U.S. grabs its ball and goes home from the talks the better it will be for Ukraine and any chance, however slim, that might exist for a peace treaty. Trump’s clown show is just sucking up air under the pretence of “talks.” There are no talks, not even in Trump’s feeble mind. Trump today declared that Russia’s concession in “talks” has been to not take all of Ukraine. Not only is that insulting, it’s a promise that was already made by Russia in the 1994 Budapest memorandum.  There is little doubt that the U.S. will withdraw its support for Ukraine at some point with only the degree of withdrawal to be determined. The question is to what degree will Europe be able to make up the shortfall and will Trump actually move the U.S. to ally Russia? That is not completely out of the question at this point.
